plot outline: Satya and Aarti were college sweethearts but after few years of marriage their romance is lost.due to stressful life of Satya and Aarti being doting wife the couple have decided not have kids.They consult a doctor for their solution who asks them only to be happy in life.
title: Mangalashtak Once More
plot: Happiness in marriage is entirely a matter of chance....and hard work, as this movie shows.
